briefTitle: Clinical Efficacy of a Toothpaste in Providing Relief From the Pain of Dentinal Hypersensitivity
officialTitle: A Clinical Study Investigating the Efficacy of a Dentifrice in Providing Short Term Relief From Dentinal Hypersensitivity
summary: A study to compare the efficacy of a test dentifrice against a control dentifrice in reducing dentinal hypersensitivity over a two week treatment period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Evaporative Air Sensitivity Pain Response on a Schiff Sensitivity Scale at Day 14
